column4: youtube isn't working since ive installed updates it keeps saying i need adobe flash but i already have it
just reinstall flash and see what happens, go to a video on youtube and click on the link that sends you to the adobe website
it looks like the same thing happened to me, go to synaptic  and click on "adobe-flashplugin"

uninstall it using synaptic and then reinstall it.  All I had to go is go to synaptic, search for "flash", I clicked on the square that said "adobe-flashplugin" and it installed it and configured it automatically
